    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        UI initialization It is triggered at the start of the application. It creates the dropdown menu for the country pickers, Mount factory to table columns so that it acn be populated, and set display properties for charts.

      • tableInputValidate

        public boolean tableInputValidate​(java.time.LocalDate date,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> iISOs)
        Data validation Checks the user input for tables.
        Parameters:
        date - The date inputted.
        iISOs - The List of countries (ISOs or names) inputted.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the input is valid.

      • chartInputValidate

        public boolean chartInputValidate​(java.time.LocalDate iStartDate,
                                  java.time.LocalDate iEndDate,
                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> iISOs)
        Data validation Checks the user input for charts.
        Parameters:
        iStartDate - The start date inputted.
        iEndDate - The end date inputted.
        iISOs - The List of countries (ISOs or names) inputted.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the input is valid.

      • xAxisLabelFactory

        public javafx.scene.chart.NumberAxis.DefaultFormatter xAxisLabelFactory​(javafx.scene.chart.NumberAxis xAxis)
        Axis Label Factory Creates formatter object that can label an axis with epoch values as "dd LLLL yyyy" format.
        Parameters:
        xAxis - The axis to be labelled with dates. Note that the axis should be populated with epoch values of dates.
        Returns:
        NumberAxis.DefaultFormatter A axis formatter object.

      • handleMenuClose

        public void handleMenuClose​(javafx.event.Event event)
        UI initialization Updates the display text to country picker as "[number] countries selected". To be triggered when the drop down menu collapses.
        Parameters:
        event - The event object a MenuButton collapsing its popup.
